text: @GovernorTomWolf @PAHealthDept 2 days ago it was announced that covid-19 causes stroke and rapid blood clotting due to blood thickening in all ages. the politicians dont seem to be talking of this because it interferes with reopening the economy https://t.co/CaPjv0U35g
